title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 203.17 - Henry m. marx
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 203.17 - Henry m. marx

State Regulations

The Banking Board hereby grants permission for Henry M. Marx
to be at the same time a director of the Canadian Bank of Commerce Trust

Company and a director of American Investment Trust (N.V.) Curacao, Netherlands, West Indies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
203.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
